title: MILK SAND BOONS: A Journey to Self-Love
description: Milk Sand Boons is the journey of every teenage girl, expecting her first love to be like her favorite romance novel, to having a reality check about the notion of true love. The collection of poems on unexpected transformation within reminds the reader to set on a path of self discovery and self-love. Any seeker of love shall know the importance of pain and vulnerability while growing up and choosing themselves before trying to find the way to a manâ€™s heart.
author: Liashna Seetul
